channel.title: Mafia on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in Mafia on Game6r

item.title: Game Bandits 3D
item.description: In this game, the user will ride a powerful sports car and go on a fun ride through the streets of the city. The goal is to collect as many gems as possible along the way. They will be needed in order to upgrade or even buy a new car. Management is simple - a standard set of keyboards. Reaction and composure will be required.

item.title: Game Bandits vs Sheriff for kids
item.description: A beautiful toy with 3D graphics and a side view. The kids will definitely like it, because there are such cute characters! The process of passing consists of many stages, during which the main character rides a horse and picks vegetables. The task is to deliver them to the sheriff (he is waiting at the end of the level).
